author: James Mackintosh
title: Tech Selloff Points to a Likely Reckoning for Global Stock Rally
text:
Stock market rotations sometimes work out well for investors, but the historical echoes in the recent selloff of highflying technology stocks are worrisome.
It is too early to be sure that the shift of the past few days out of the most fashionable tech stocks will continue, but if it does the wider market faces some big challenges.
